summary: This is an email chain from July 25, 2019, regarding difficulties obtaining information about an incident involving high-profile prisoner Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. A USMS official requests assistance from the Bureau of Prisons (BOP) after being unable to get information from the MCC warden and assistant warden.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the incident at MCC New York that officials are trying to get information about.

persons.name: DAD M
persons.context: The recipient of the initial email from USMS, who is asked for assistance in obtaining information about the Epstein incident.

persons.name: Associate Warden
persons.context: Identified by the BOP official as the person who can provide information about the incident at MCC New York.

persons.name: USM
persons.context: Mentioned as having no luck obtaining information from the MCC warden and assistant warden.

persons.name: Chief
persons.role: USMS Chief for S/New York office
persons.context: Mentioned alongside the USM as having no luck obtaining information from MCC leadership.

persons.name: Warden
persons.context: One of the MCC officials from whom USMS officials have been unable to obtain information about the Epstein incident.

persons.name: Assistant Warden
persons.context: One of the MCC officials from whom USMS officials have been unable to obtain information about the Epstein incident.

connections.description: Both are USMS officials in the S/New York office who are jointly trying to get information about the Epstein incident.
Both are senior officials at MCC New York who are not providing information about the Epstein incident to external law enforcement.
DAD M contacts the Associate Warden to provide assistance to the USMS in obtaining information about the Epstein incident.

events.title: Incident involving Jeffrey Epstein at MCC New York
events.description: An unspecified incident occurs with high-profile prisoner Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, prompting USMS officials to seek information from BOP officials.

events.title: USMS requests BOP assistance regarding Epstein incident
events.description: USMS officials contact BOP official DAD M for help obtaining basic information about the Epstein incident after being unable to get information from MCC New York warden and assistant warden.

locations: MCC New York (Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York)
320 1st St. NW, HOLC Bldg. 545, Washington, DC 20534 (Federal Bureau of Prisons office)
keyFacts: On July 25, 2019, there was an incident involving Jeffrey Epstein at MCC New York.
US Marshals Service officials were unable to obtain basic information about the incident from MCC New York's warden and assistant warden.
A USMS official reached out to a Bureau of Prisons official (DAD M) for assistance in getting information about the Epstein incident.
The BOP official indicated that an Associate Warden would be able to provide the requested information.
